attributes.action: call a general election rather than have Gordon Brown, representing a Scottish seat, forced on the English as Prime Minister by the Labour Party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following devolution England should be given a choice as to whether it wants to have as Prime Minister a person elected to parliament as representative of another country ie Scotland.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
